name: Spanish Potato Omelet
author: PATTY5
summary: There's nothing too fancy about this rustic Spanish style omelet, just lots of hearty goodness from crispy fried potatoes and onions. Chopped tomatoes and green onions lend even more flavor and color.
ingredients: 2  tomatoes - peeled, seeded, and coarsely chopped
directions: In a large frying pan or skillet, heat olive oil over medium-high heat
Sprinkle potatoes lightly with salt and pepper
Cook until golden brown and crisp
Once the potatoes are golden, stir in the onions
Cook, stirring occasionally, until onions soften and begin to brown
Meanwhile, beat eggs together with salt and pepper
Pour eggs into pan and stir gently to combine
Reduce heat to low and cook until eggs begin to brown on the bottom
Loosen bottom of omelet with a spatula, invert a large plate over the pan, and carefully turn the omelet out onto it
Slide the omelet back into the pan with the uncooked side down
Garnish omelet with tomato and green onion and serve warm
